nom.multi: [fr] Mot de Passe Complexe [en] Strong Passwords

plugin.description:
[fr] Testeur de compléxité des mots de passes. _ Adaptation du script de [->http://dev.digitalspaghetti.me.uk/password/]. [en] Test the strength of passwords entered when registering to the site. _ Adaptation of [->http://dev.digitalspaghetti.me.uk/password/].
_ [Configuration->./?exec=cfg&cfg=passe_complexe]
